title: Contrast-A
creator: Das Plankton
description: A color picker application for web designers that allows users to interact with a 3-dimensional color RGB color space, examine the contrast of color pairs according to WCAG 2.0, view the results for various types of color deficiency, and create and print custom color palettes. Vision/mouse required.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
